jackie1_1.name: Jackie
text: I once consumed this artifact that gave me near Shadekin level intelligence
My family stayed the same though
It's been really hard since then...

jackie2_1.name: Jackie
text: We've been going pretty deep, huh?
The artifact that can change the past?

jackie2_3.name: Jackie
text: If we both reach the bottom...
...I hope the artifact has multiple uses, you know?
I hope we can both find what we seek
I know it's hard to be here
Hey, thanks for talking to me...
This whole thing has been pretty lonely

abbie1_3.name: Abbie
text: Weapons, healing supplies and some magic enhancements
I have to ask you though...

abbie1_4.name: Zaine
text: I'm not really sure of the definition of 'Looper'

abbie1_5.name: Abbie
text: Are you looking for the artifact that is told to lie at the bottom of this place?

abbie1_7.name: Abbie
text: Not to pry in your business...
But I would suggest to stop looking for the artifact.
I think you should leave this place...

abbie1_9.name: Abbie
text: All the people that came into my shop looking for the artifact...

abbie1_10.name: Abbie
text: I don't know what happens to them...
But when I see them again they are aggressive,
They don't even talk to me...
...They just mumble a strange chant and attack me...
Every day I am forced to fight innocent people.

abbie1_11.name: Zaine
text: How much money do you make shopkeep?

abbie1_13.name: Zaine
text: It must be a bustling business...
...It would be really bad if someone snatched the artifact and this dungeon became devoid of people...

abbie1_15.name: Zaine
text: I know what you're trying to do!
Trust me I've met shopkeepers before...
All you care for is money.
You won't stop me from getting the artifact.

abbie1_17.name: Zaine
text: The artifact is what will fix my life.
It is what gives all the people here hope for a better future.

abbie1_19.name: Zaine
text: I think this conversation lasted long enough.
